content.text: Burwarton Show, The Showground, Cleobury North, Bridgnorth, Shropshire WV16 6RP.

We will be joined by Severn Rivers Trust on our stand in the livestock area of Burwarton Show where we will be talking about the benefits of creating woodland and the generous grants available for farmers and landowners and woodland management.
Mid Somerset Show, The Mid Somerset Showground, Cannard’s Grave Road, Shepton Mallet BA4 4GF.
